item.title: A Very English Christmas (Christmas in the Cotswolds) (2023) - 90 mins
item.description: Xxxxx’x x xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xx made that A VERY ENGLISH CHRISTMAS is a psychological reflection of the main character’s narcissism in how it moves hollow characters around on the chessboard of the narrative with no regard for their feelings or interiority.
